Player History
Drafted in 26th round, 415th overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Injured on 5/29/2016 with a Broken Jaw, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 8/11/2016, off William Kinch (NY)...
Earned first career win on 8/23/2016...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2018, going 5-0, 0.89...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2018, going 4-1, 1.71...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,250,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/22/2020 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/31/2020 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2020, winning 2 games with a 1.38 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2020, going 4-0, 1.60...
Injured on 8/19/2020 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5-6 weeks...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,578,571 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/1/2021 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,550,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2022, going 4-0, 1.41...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
8/29/2022: Signed a contract extension with Boston, $14,500,000 per year, for 5 years.
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
